execution_plan.description: Retrieve all receipts with their associated customer ids from the receipts database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE CustomerId IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve items (goods) on the receipts obtained in step 1. Will be used to link receipts to goods.
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Item FROM items WHERE Receipt IN ($step1.ReceiptNumber) AND Item IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Get price information for the goods referenced by the items from step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, price FROM goods WHERE id IN ($step2.Item) AND price IS NOT NULL;
